评论详情: It’s thin and has incredible drape. Before I put it on the material feels cool, almost wet, but it’s pure comfort once it’s on. The hems are rolled which looks chic and military or utilitarian with the olive drab color I picked. It’s very thin and shows my bra and skin texture but the material is fully opaque in this color. It has some light stretch but the fabric has body, it’s not just cheap spandex. The shoulders and sleeves are fitted and well articulated. The material stretched to accommodate my bust without being baggy at the waist. I look forward to trying other colors.

评论概述: Stylish and Flattering Crop Top - Perfect for Going Out or Casual Wear
评论详情: The ANRABESS Women’s Long Sleeve Crop Top is a fantastic addition to my wardrobe! The fitted design is flattering, hugging in all the right places, and the crewneck adds a touch of classic style that pairs well with high-waisted jeans or skirts. The material feels soft and has just the right amount of stretch, making it comfortable to wear all day or night. I love how versatile it is – perfect for a night out but also easy to dress down for a casual look. The top holds up well after washing, retaining its shape and softness. If you're looking for a chic, fitted crop top, this one is a great choice!
Snug long sleeve top. Very thin. Cute but could be a bit stretchier. Nice color. Decent price for what it is. I normally wear a small and should have sized up.

Great quality for this price. Form fitting without being thin and actually has a quality substance to the material that makes it feel supportive. Washes good and has not had any shrinkage or loss of color. I have the navy and the red and both have a strong and vibrant hue. The red is deep and not orangey at all. I am 5'5" and 112# and bought small. They aren't too long which makes them appealing to wear with natural waist skirts and pants. They are still long enough to tuck in. I will buy more colors. I have many different colors in the same brand of short sleeve tees and they are a go-to top always. It will arrive quite wrinkled, but not a trace of wrinkles after washing and hang drying.
This is comfortable and cute I wear it under and over different outfits it’s good quality and the fabric stays nice after washing. Not see through at all. I need this in more colors!
Very soft! Snug fitting so I can wear it under my tees in the cold weather, and still look dressy.

It's a cute top, but curvy girls beware.The top was my right size, however the arms all the way down to my wrists was SUPER tight, without enough stretch. If you have bigger arms, this is NOT the top for you.
I have had this shirt for a year in a different color and got another one because of how well the material lasts and how soft and flattering it is

评论概述: “Good Enough” Option When Your Top Isn’t the Point
评论详情: These tops are flimsy and easily wrinkled, and generally look as inexpensive as they are. No matter what size I get, you can see the outline of my bra through it because the material is thin despite not being sheer.  I buy these when I need a top to layer under something, like a strappy dress, or when I need a top in a specific color for a one-off outfit. As an example, I wanted a forest green tee to wear under an Anthropologie pinafore. The color isn’t very common, and most of the top is covered by the dress, so this worked. I would not get these as a staple.  If you want a bodycon, Y2K fit then order your normal clothing size. If you want a relaxed fit, I would size up.

The shirt is true to size. The color matches the picture is as I expected. It’s a good base piece for a wardrobe.  I took off a star because the material is somewhat scratchy on the inside, even after washing several times.

Very nice top if you prefer not to wear a body suit, but still look like you are wearing one. Very stretchy, not sheer at all, and true to size. I purchased the black.
